StringProperty.Name: LogicalName
StringProperty.Description: Logical name of the resource in the final assembly.

StringProperty.Name: OutputFileName
StringProperty.Description: Name of the final output file this .resx file contributes to.

BoolProperty.Name: DefaultLocalizedResources
BoolProperty.Description: Indicates whether this .resx file contributes to the default resources or to a satellite DLL. This is controlled by the filename of the resource file.
